272700.name: Assassin’s Creed® Liberation HD - Bonus Pack
272700.description:
Assassin’s Creed® Liberation HD is the remastering of the stunning pre-American Revolution chapter of the Assassin’s Creed saga. Discover the Bonus pack, and employ brand new weapon improvements for Aveline to enhance her fighting skills.
This pack contains two new weapons: the Pirate Scimitar and the Voodoo Dagger; and two new weapon upgrades: the Gun Powder Pouch and Poison Dart Pouch upgrades.
272700.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
